text: Abo baProfeti! Sakhetha abanye babo kunabanye, Kwabanye uAllâh Wathetha nabo (ngqo); abanye Wabanyusa baba kumabakala (entlonipheko); kanti u’Isâ (uYesu) unyana kaMaryam (uMariya), Samnika imiqondiso nobungqina, Samxhasa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Ukuba uAllâh Wayethandile, izizukulwana ezalandela emva (koko) ngekuba azizanga zilwe zodwa, emva kokuba iiVesi ezicacileyo zika- Allâh zazisele zifikile kubo, kodwa baya baba nezahlukano Abanye babo bakholwa abanye babo abakholwa. Ukuba uAllâh Wayethandile ngebengazanga balwe kodwa uAllâh Wenza oko Athande ukwenza
